comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

Pretty decent game, couple of suggestions though: instead of limiting lives to a paywall, why not use opt-in ads which we can click to respawn the character? Also, it'd be better if instead of two movement buttons placed on only one side of the screen, why not make either sides of the screen be for forward move through right screen and backward move through left, and double click for removing the hindrances? Just my two cents, but overall it's a nice game to kill time
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game

Excellent running based game with puzzles to solve. There are ads but that is by choice to enable them otherwise there are no ads. Keeps my attention to continue to keep playing more levels or retry to get all 3 stars. Everytime you die it's a different character but same premise as for as completing the levels.

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)

description: Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis. I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. descriptionHTML:
Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!

Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis.
I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. Ta hjälp av massor av karaktärer som Babblarna, Svea och Pino för att engagera era förskolebarn!

Hur fungerar Jaramba Förskola?

• Jaramba Förskola ger obegränsad tillgång till innehåll som motsvarar hundratals fristående appar
• Nya spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt läggs till varje månad i en aldrig sinande ström av nytt material
• Det speciellt framtagna gränssnittet riktar sig till dig som pedagog för att du enkelt ska kunna förbereda, eller spontant starta, en lärorik stund med barnen
• Använd ett abonnemang för en avdelning på upp till 20 barn
• Styr vad barnen fokuserar på med Jaramba Förskolas fokuslås
• Jaramba Förskola streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en Android-enhet, så appen upptar aldrig onödigt utrymme.

Då Jaramba förskola är avsedd för bruk i förskoleverksamhet kommer vi till en början att administrera användarkonton genom intresseanmälan på https://jaramba.se/forskola
Kontakta Jaramba online för att komma igång med konto för din förskola idag!

Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/
Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/

comments: Too short of gameplay I saw DanTDM play this game on PC I think and it was pretty funny and it looked cool. I saw it on Google Play and bought it... I was preeeety disappointed. Don't waste your precious 30 seconds of gameplay time! There are just so many games out there that are better, even Flappy Bird. However, the funny fail screens make it only a bit better.

I downloaded this app, I started to play the game, it's was really funny and enjoyable! But the talking on the court was a little too long. It then showed me running and it said who made it, who was the director, the music and voices. Then it told me to press retry from start. It put me the whole way back. Please fix this problem and I will give you another start and if you do the things that other people do I will give five stars. Other than that it's amazing!

While the game was fairly short, it was also very well done. I think many of the reviews saying it was boring or saying they "beat it in five minutes" didn't get the point of the game. The point of the game is more about seeing all the different possibilities rather than winning. For this reason it's mostly a matter of whether or not you enjoy the creator's sense of humor which I greatly enjoy. Nothing about this game is perfect, but nothing is bad either. All in all this is an awesome series of games.

description: A lot of parents worry because their children don’t want to use the toilet or don’t use it properly. The "Toilet Training" app teaches potty training in a clear and fun way. It is designed for children aged under 3 and shows real life situations through cute graphics and sounds. It will guide your children towards developing a habit of properly going to the toilet.Fun features:- Audio instructions: friendly and to-the-point instructions facilitate learning and make the process more fun. - Interactive design: aimed at satisfying kids’curiosity.- Simple and child-friendly gameplay. - Didactic game concept: It instils positive habits and teaches correct behavior so parents don’t have to worry about the little ones not using the toilet properly.- -- --  Design concepts:We focus on inspirational learningWe focus on skill-buildingWe focus on bringing fun contents to our young audienceTake the baby bus for an unique learning experience!The series introduction:Baby Bus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6. The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. description: Update! New hairstyle, you can buy the diamond braid in the shop! Also new decorations and background, for easter and St. Patricksday!In this game you can braid the mane of your horse of in different in hairstylesHorse Care - Mane BraidingDone with the normal braided hair spa salon? This is a special sequel! A horse braided hair spa salon! How great is that? Now you can give the pony a special braided hairstyle and be a hairdresser for horses! For now you can braid the mane of the horse and later we can do braiding of the pony tail. Brush the horse mane and follow the tutorial to make the most beautiful hairdos for ponies you have learned on horse camp. The most horse riders love also to do the hair of your pony and make good hairdos. Be an amazon but first you go braiding the manes in different braids and hairstyles. For now you only can make normal braids with button braids or you also can call it knob braids. Later we will add: french braid, continental braid and scalloped mane. There are so many different braids and hairstyles for horses, you want to learn it all! Here you can learn the hairdos and later you can make those braids by your own horse or pony. It’s a sort of beauty salon but then in the stable for your pony. description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Different sections of roads.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- No annoying ads.- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store in order to improve (suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ...)

description: Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. Be a Wild Cheetah and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of cheetahs, fight against fierce animals like lion, crocodile and rhino. Evolve your Cheetah to become the strongest Cheetah ever.FEATURES:REALISTIC SIMULATORMaintain your health and energy by eating and drinking water, raise your family, explore massive world, fight other animals to become more powerfulSTART YOUR FAMILYWild Cheetah Sim features the ability to have real family. Family members are not only good companions but they can be trained to fight along side in combatREAL DAY AND NIGHTWild Cheetah Sim has a real in-game cycle of day and night on a 24 hour based time system. For every 24 minutes that the game is played, a full day and night cycle of 24 hours passes in the gameACHIEVEMENTSThe game features achievement system. Unlock the achievements by hunting specific animals and discover amazing facts about Cheetah.ADDITIONAL FEATURES- RPG-style gameplay: level up, evolve, complete quests- Different options of appearance for cheetah- Information tab in game menu to view characteristics of animals - Rotatable camera, zoom in and out- Realistic environments, big world- A lot of real animals to hunt- Quest system, 20 missions to complete- Awesome 3D graphicsFollow us on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/turborocketgamesFollow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/TurboRocketGameFollow us in Vkontakte:http://vk.com/turborocketgamesHave fun playing Wild Cheetah Sim!If you have any suggestions or ideas for the game - contact us please:vladimir.duchenchuk@gmail.comWe are getting happier with each of your email message.Please note, that we are no way affiliated with any other animal simulator games developed by other game companies.Thanks!
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. Be a Wild Cheetah and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of cheetahs, fight against fierce animals like lion, crocodile and rhino. Evolve your Cheetah to become the strongest Cheetah ever.

FEATURES:

REALISTIC SIMULATOR
Maintain your health and energy by eating and drinking water, raise your family, explore massive world, fight other animals to become more powerful

START YOUR FAMILY
Wild Cheetah Sim features the ability to have real family. Family members are not only good companions but they can be trained to fight along side in combat

REAL DAY AND NIGHT
Wild Cheetah Sim has a real in-game cycle of day and night on a 24 hour based time system. For every 24 minutes that the game is played, a full day and night cycle of 24 hours passes in the game

ACHIEVEMENTS
The game features achievement system. Unlock the achievements by hunting specific animals and discover amazing facts about Cheetah.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
- RPG-style gameplay: level up, evolve, complete quests
- Different options of appearance for cheetah
- Information tab in game menu to view characteristics of animals
- Rotatable camera, zoom in and out
- Realistic environments, big world
- A lot of real animals to hunt
- Quest system, 20 missions to complete
- Awesome 3D graphics

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/turborocketgames

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/TurboRocketGame

Follow us in Vkontakte:
http://vk.com/turborocketgames

Have fun playing Wild Cheetah Sim!
If you have any suggestions or ideas for the game - contact us please:
vladimir.duchenchuk@gmail.com
We are getting happier with each of your email message.

Please note, that we are no way affiliated with any other animal simulator games developed by other game companies.

Thanks!

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ☆ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

comments: With an easy guide, on 'How to play'. Once you get going its great fun. Dare I say quite addictive. Fantastic animations. Amazing back ground music. Plus, no app freezes either.  Its an 'A☆' from me at least.  Only, what would be a great idea. Is all the piggy bank jewels you build up, should be awarded for your hard efforts. Should not have to buy them back.  Only purchase jewels when desperate.

Ok.....we need an aquarium just for the holiday's.  I cleaned out one aquarium and that's all I have in there is the holidays.  After this session I'll probably save one just for Christmas itself.  Love the unlimited times! Keep the surprises coming!! I don't like so many clocks in one game and the "timed" games are insane! It is definitely challenging.  I play several times a day if possible.

Great game. Challenging, fun, and addictive lol. I'm 32 and play this often so it's not just for kids . Give it a try it's very satisfying . Just wished you could add friends ... People that play whom you may not know so we all could help each other. That would make it more interactive and a lot more fun. No one I know plays so it would have to be other fellow fishermen 😉

If you like 🍬 Crush on Facebook? Then you will like this game even better. The graphics are cute and the 🐟 give you occasional hints as to what will make them super happy. And then you have that "Aha" moment. There it is.  The trap is set. Lol you are not continuing to play because it is addictive. You play in order to collect coins so you can buy stuff to make the little fish happy. 💘 the graphics kind of a little like an underwater Farmville with the plants 🐟 and decorations you can get fort your aquarium. I do play with 🎶 turned off. Cute game so far.        Graphics make it better than Candy Crush.

Fantastic game! It's great fun decorating the aqariums and the game board is very clear. The recent move of the boosters to the right hand side of the screen was a VERY bad decision, as I have accidentally used them when my hand has brushed against them - this has happened many times already. A good addition would be a marker indicating a purchased item.

Because you only get 5 lives and you make some levels with too few moves. It would be nice if you could interact more with your fish and tanks. The whole point of beating levels is to build up your tanks...but you can't do anything with them while waiting for lives. It would be a fantastic game if there was more to do within the tanks!
description: Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game! Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure! Features:● Unique gameplay: swap and match pieces, design and decorate aquariums, play with and take care of fish—all in one puzzle game!● Play hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 levels● Compete with other players to develop your aquarium even faster● Explore an exciting aquatic world with funny talking 3D fish that each have their own personality● Liven up fish tanks with breathtaking underwater decor● Grab your scuba mask and enjoy amazing aquarium graphics● It’s a blast for everyone: share your Fishdom mania with your Facebook friends!● No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play Please note that Fishdom is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Fishdom? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FishdomOfficial Questions? Contact our tech support at fishdom@playrix.com
descriptionHTML:
Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game!

Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure!

Features:
● Unique gameplay: swap and match pieces, design and decorate aquariums, play with and take care of fish—all in one puzzle game!
● Play hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 levels
● Compete with other players to develop your aquarium even faster
● Explore an exciting aquatic world with funny talking 3D fish that each have their own personality
● Liven up fish tanks with breathtaking underwater decor
● Grab your scuba mask and enjoy amazing aquarium graphics
● It’s a blast for everyone: share your Fishdom mania with your Facebook friends!
● No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play

Please note that Fishdom is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

Enjoying Fishdom? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FishdomOfficial

Questions? Contact our tech support at fishdom@playrix.com
recentChanges: Dive into a romantic Fishdom update!
- Collect valentines at the beginning of February and exchange them for custom decorations and a unique pet!
- Open gift chests on holiday levels to get a special reward!
- A new power-up, the Torpedo. Set off a powerful explosion anywhere on the field!
summary: Swap and match to create lovely homes for adorable fish!
title: Fishdom

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:

The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot

Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. And add newer cars and guns it's fun but and the same time it's boring plz do these.!!!!!!!!!!!

Pretty good game, though there should be a higher emphasis on fighting. We should be able to register accounts, and receive money for our kills. Also, when we kill someone, it should say in chat who we killed. Game has great potential, registering accounts would be nice to so that we can make friends and remember people. :D

I love the game, it is a great time killer, but I have suggestions. First you should add more guns, like pistols, and add grenades. Also have the plane controls more easier to use, I always have difficulty with that. Add more maps, more planes to fly. Make it so it can save the cars or planes you get. I always lose money buying the same car again every time I log back in the game. Other than that, I love the game!

Make a option where you can choose your sensitivity. The sniper Scope is harder to you in with the new one. Make more guns in the game. Finally when you stay still in the game: people, cars, move which makes it harder to shoot. One you run over a player they should die. Please add these stuff to the game for a 5 star rating.

comments: This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.
Good game, slightly annoying at times to control movement of the characters, tend to become awkward when trying to stay in straight line. Other than that is a good game to pass the time!

I can not get this game to work. It says 'Your hardware does not support this application'. This has happened with a few other fireman games. I have a new Sony XZ Premium phone so I don't understand why it won't work. Can anyone tell me if I can resolve this problem?
Made for kids....and made for them to accidentally click the rediculous amount of adds
Very good game we get a good experience of firefighters

description: Want to serve humanity? Like rescue, action, driving and parking games? NY City Firefighter 2017 awaits!On a bright sunny day in New York City, you encounter a building in flames! You are a courageous firefighter, and your duty is to rescue your fellow New Yorkers. Are you up for the challenge?! Grab your hose and slap on your combat boots; fires don’t wait for anybody. NY City FireFighter includes brigade truck driving, parking, and action play. Race through city roads with your team in a quick fashion. Evade traffic and keep pedestrians safe. Use your parking skills to avoid clashing with city vehicles. Next, embark on several rescue missions in different locations. There will be shopping malls, banks, schools, office buildings, and even hospitals to rescue! Drive your fire truck to a HOT location and COOL it down! Locate fire points using your radar to rescue within given time and get maximum mission completion points. As you progress within the game, levels will become more interesting and challenging!NY City FireFighter 2017 Features:•Amazing visual and Cool sounds effects•Super thrilling Firefighter Missions to complete•Numbers of Firefighters Trucks and ambulances•New York City Environment with Cool 3D Graphics•Numbers of Animated People to Rescue•Smooth, Easy & Addictive GameplayAbout Tap2Play:Tap2Play, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tapinator, Inc.Tapinator Inc. comments: I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club or Cart Thills can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug to me or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.  Edit: I love the events, especially the cart one.

I normally dont make reviews on games that i play unless it is really good. I love the hardcore atmosphere of the game,reminds me of the good old days when i still like playing minecraft. My only complaint is that the spawn rates for the undead e.g leepers, templars are too high in my opinion. Other than that. This is a great game

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Loved the game. Beautiful work but sadly its designed to open your wallet and doesn't even seem like they bothered trying to hide the fact.  I hope they fix some things so that you can actually play it. I will continue to play in hopes that it improves if it does ill re rate it.

The game is ok.. i love the idea.. but in all RPG and similar games you can accuire your items from when you died from your body in that zone.. also its good when you enter the inventory to pause the game.. when entering a zone the game should give some time before reseting the material and monsters if the player re-enters the same zone.. These are the most critical points so far i have encountered.. please take these in consideration.. thank you
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
recentChanges: — Invisible character issue on some devices is fixed
— Game progress saving system is improved
— Rare case with empty event chests is fixed
— An issue with other exiles' corpses disappearance is fixed
— The Night Guest now comes later and less frequently
summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

comments: Awesome game. Very nice controls but greedy devs. I spend money in games but to pay 59 sek just to remove ads is too much. And too many ads which spoils the otherwise great game. Either reduce the cost to remove ads or include other benefits to the same cost. The frequency of ads should be reduced.

Fun gameplay, but a bit buggy and confusing when a train is near a switch since you often stop a train when trying to switch it. Difficulty ramps up to insanely unfair after the first few levels. Since the passengers spawn at random even when you're absolutely perfect at switching the trains you still don't often get 3 stars on the level. Getting 3 stars on a level is basically luck at that point.

This game was great for the first few levels, and then some frustrations set in about the design. Some levels are just tough to see which tracks go where because of the nature of the isometric view, but the real deal breaker for me is having to click the arrow to switch a track path. Why can't this be a lever to the side of the track, especially when two path switches overlap? Countless times I've accidentally stopped a train on an intersection instead of switching the track for the next train. It tests your patience instead of your multitasking and tracking abilities. The ads are very, very plentiful. I urge you to continue using the free version if you want to support the devs because they probably get more revenue from ads in the long run than the $5 cost to remove the ads. Potentially great.

Rigged gameplay. I made it thru several levels until I tapped on the train and it didnt stop, resulting in a crash, further resulting in a 30 second ad that I couldn't escape. How convenient. I have noticed more and more developers finding ever-newer ways to slip ads into the games.
Hadn't played it for a while, went back and it had deleted all my progress. Not going to start again, so deleting the app

This game was honestly amazing. I love how it's such a simple game yet it's so much fun to play. The low poly graphics and the music really synchronized and make it so much more better. Even the tutorial, it integrates into the game in a very interesting manner. The only problem was that it lags a bit, but otherwise Northplay, loved it!
description: Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.  Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.  As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.  • Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds • Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches • Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions • Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection • Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit • Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ • Share your most explosive crashes with your friends • Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle
descriptionHTML:
Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.

Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.

As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.

• Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds
• Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches
• Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions
• Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection
• Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit
• Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ
• Share your most explosive crashes with your friends
• Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle

comments: enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

The art work, the atmosphere, the weapon choices. It's perfect. I couldn't be more happier that i found this game. The only thing I would personally change is the Tribe Leader's cheering sound. It's a bit silly and is the only thing that truly breaks the immersion of this game for me.

MEET THE BEARS
Grizz, Panda and Ice Bear are three brothers living in the Bay Area, hanging together and trying to have fun as they find their way in life. They just happen to be bears, is all.

MINIGAME MASTERY
Help the bears as they go about their everyday misadventures in six different minigames. Make Panda the best barista in the city. Practice mystic martial arts with Ice Bear. Grab food samples from the market with Grizz. See how high you can score in each game!

Compete against your friends in local multiplayer matches! Use pass and play mode if you only have one device, or connect with your friends' devices to play at the same time. Who will be the ultimate winner?

Have a blast playing a variety of different minigames with Grizz, Panda and Ice Bear in FREE FUR ALL!

description: Building & crafting game for boys & girls! Build and create in the Desert blocky craft Exploration: Building Game - Fun Game for Free! Explore Middle East - Arab areas! Build a Mosque, Oasis or Savanna. Craft items, beware of desert storm!  Desert craft blocky heads Exploration! Build under scorching sun, on hot sand. Build the Arab way! Create replica of Mecca or other saint muslim places! Build, craft and explore! Explore caves in search of diamonds and ore. Trade with Blocky Heads! Explore the Savanna. Craft things you need! Build your own house! Use creativity. House building game with FPP (First person perspective). Great game for boys and girls! Be creative in this blocky pocket edition game. Create structures you want, from a simple home to a pyramid or a castle! Building and creating! blocky craft building - create Skyblock world or the whole city! Play with animals (camels, goats etc.)  Perfect game for teenage boys and girls or even adults!Creative mode craft! Use blocks, voxel to create your own pixel desert world! Adventure & exploration in mobile game! Let’s Explore, dig and build in a voxel world, build on the move, Dig blocks, Mine resources, Craft hundreds of items. Infinite-world block sandbox game, give the players pretty much everything they will ever want to build with, and all the tools they should ever need to actually get the job well done. Explore randomly generated worlds and build amazing things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off the dangerous mobs. Craft, create, and explore. No need to go anywhere, everything is here! This game is brought to you by creators of Girls Craft: Mine Exploration and Princess Craft! Expect quality! Deser blocky craft Exploration: Building Game is a free game for teenage boys and girls and adults! Fun Games For Free!FEATURES:Use blocks to build Explore the sandbox worldOver 500 block textures & elementsmine and build!Flying in creative modeDay & NightAnimals UPCOMING FEATURES:blocky craft modeBuilding & crafting - fastmodeMultiplayer with chat!Multiplayer coop Custom texturesVR (Virtual Reality Game)

By installing this game, you will get high-quality 3d graphics and realistic animations of professional soccer.

Choose your favorite team from the list of real teams-applicants and participants of the 2018 World Cup in Russia, go through the whole tournament, from the group stage, playoff matches and win in the final - make your team Soccer World Champion in 2018.

The game has several gameplay modes:
- Penalties
- Dribbling
- Combined

Game Modes:
- Single Player
- Multiplayer

Player Customizer: in FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018 - you can create your own character.

Install and play - it has never been so easy to be on a huge stadium and score a goal that will decide the fate of your national team.

Enjoy the believability of the football simulator, great 3D animations, simple and intuitive controls, exciting game mechanics, created with the help of professional soccer players.

Start playing and getting comfortable is very simple, but you have to try to win. The real stars of soccer are those who win the World Cup and get the coveted Cup.

Your progress is displayed in the online ranking of players from all over the world - the ratings of soccer teams and the ratings of the players themselves.

Every 2 weeks you have the opportunity to re-come to the top of the Hall of Fame! Game statistics - another way to show everyone your success.

You personally can watch the progress of friends and enemies from around the world.

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

comments: Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

The game is running well but there's a small problem. When I go off track, the game freezes and kicks me back to the start screen. However, the game works fine. It's just that small problem in bothered with. Also add an option for manual shifting

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down tho😂 Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developers😊🙏 Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.

description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO

comments: Super duper fun game,  loved it, still loving it. I managed to actually hold the ak47 correctly with my hand on the handle, same with the pistol. Just one minor complaint though,  the controls are supposed to be hard, yes,  and they are,  in a fun way, but the rotating hand control joystick seems to be inverted somehow,  could you possibly fix the rotating controls a bit,  it really throughs me off being it seems like one of the the Y axis is inverted, but not the X axis? descriptionHTML:
HD version of Rolling on the Geometry Sky with new levels, traps and obstacles. The new special effects and sounds will make you feel inside the game.

Rolling Geometry Sky HD is a game that tests the limits of your speed and reaction. The splendid scene of a 3D geometry world allows you to experience the imaginary traps and obstacles. Now, control the ball and conquer all the worlds of this exciting challenge.

How to play?

Drag the ball to the left or right to avoid all obstacles and
try not to fall off the track! Collect many power-ups to transform the ball
into an invulnerable ball of fire!


Features:

• One touch control with simple operations
• Stunning 3D worlds and effects
• Nice music and 3d sound effects
• Rich scenes (including Geometry, Forest, Snowfield, Candy and more!)
• Realistic light effects (day - night)
summary: Rolling Geometry Sky is a game that tests the limits of your speed and reaction.
title: Rolling Geometry Sky

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
summary: Simple turn based strategy game with a unique mix of tactics and luck.
title: Board Battlefield

description: Is it a Robot? Is it a Snake? It’s a Robo-Snake!Uh-oh...there’s been a mishap at the lab. A science experiment has gone horribly wrong after researchers attempted to create a docile Robo-Snake! The monster escaped and is on the loose in your town! Fend off superheroes and cops as they chase you around the city! Terrorize the streets full of roaming pedestrians. People will fight you with any weapons they can get their hands on… Show them you’re the strongest predator with your special android and reptilian powers. Battle and attack! Use special attacks that allow you to spit fire and coil your tail around your prey. Reel the victims in with your strong tail!Transform between an anaconda and a robot! You have the best of both worlds. Slither and slide through the city. Destroy buildings, throw vehicles, and kill opponents to get maximum points during missions. Can you escape the city and avoid animal control and police? Transform Snake Robot City Battle 2017 Features:• Awesome 3D city environment to explore• Realistic visual & sound effects• Intuitive & Addictive gameplay• Transformation features to transform your snake to super robot• Realistic Snake and Robot Anatomy and Physics• Challenging Missions to complete in modern city environment.

descriptionHTML:
Adopt the cute rabbits bunny and help her to grow up, taking care of her, dress her up, decorate her house and make her the cutest of rabbits !
Discover the city of bunnies with multiple activities and games to keep your pet busy. In rabbit city, you never get bored !

🐰 ADOPT BABY BU
This pet needs a new family. You have been chosen to take care of this rabbit and take care of it !

🐰 TAKE CARE OF HER
Take care of Bu and become her best friend, help her to evolve from baby to adult to become the rabbit city star!

🐰 GIVE HER A STYLE
A gigantic wardrobe awaits you to allow you to make your rabbit unique. From the princess outfit to the the rock star, your bunny will be the cutest !

🐰 A UNIQUE WORLD
Make your rabbits pet's house a magical and unique place. Customize the rooms according to your tastes !

🐰 GAMES AND ACTIVITIES
Bu is part of a cute and imaginary world, she lives in the city of bunnies, a city populated with extraordinary rabbits.
But many other animals are hidden there and they have with them magic items, it's up to you to find them to unlock unique clothes !
You will also find many other activities and games in the city of rabbits: The sticker store to start a unique collection of beautiful pictures, the photo booth to show the world that you have the most cute rabbits, a beauty salon to change the appearance of your bunny so that it is unique.
But also challenges, missions, trips and mini games to take care of your bunny and have fun so she never gets bored !

Now that this game and the universe of bunnies has no secrets for you, come and discover and take care of this cute rabbits baby bunny !
Your turn !

description: It’s man’s best friend, and he’s ready to play!This is for everyone who’s bemoaned their parents for a dog in the good old days. Stunt Dog Simulator is doggy heaven! Bask your pup in a countryside, stunts arena with all kinds of challenging, awe inspiring obstacles! Become the master trainer once you’ve passed the circuit several times in a row. Perform outstanding stunts only when you build your canine’’s abilities. Reach the highest rank among the competitors. Your courageous dog will endure swinging punching bags, smashing hammers and ramps, and dash through runways while leaping over hurdles. This doggy will see the adventure of a lifetime! Select only from the finest breeds at your fingertips: the German Shepherd, Dalmatian, Golden Retriever, and more! Show off the prowess of your tricks and win first place!Stunt Dog Simulator 3D Features:•Amazing 3D dog stunts game•Smooth Tilt and swipe function to control dog•Addictive dog stunts Missions•Realistic 3D visual and cool sound effects•All the best doggies to choose from•Spectacular and Challenging 3D Rural Environment•Intuitive, Responsive and Realistic Gameplay!About TapinatorTapinator (Ticker: TAPM) designs, develops, and publishes games on mobile platforms. The Company’s portfolio includes over 250 mobile gaming titles that, collectively, have achieved over 350 million player downloads. Tapinator is headquartered in New York. For more info, visit Tapinator.com.

description: Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process. Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.5) Make ultrasound scan to see in what state the babies are in.6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.7) Play with her child, help her to do so as well.8) Make the baby go to sleep, so you can help Melissa dress.A game for young children who want to become a doctor in the near future. Test your skills to the limit and show the world that you can become a doctor. With so many mommy’s to select from and so many prince and princesses to come in this world. descriptionHTML:
Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process.


Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.
4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.
5) Make ultrasound scan to see in what state the babies are in.
6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.
7) Play with her child, help her to do so as well.
8) Make the baby go to sleep, so you can help Melissa dress.


A game for young children who want to become a doctor in the near future. Test your skills to the limit and show the world that you can become a doctor. With so many mommy’s to select from and so many prince and princesses to come in this world. You surely can be the best surgery doctor on playstore

comments: Love it but Ive been playing it for a while now but out of no where it keeps saying unfortunately loop taxi has stopped. It won't let me play it at all. I'm going to try to uninstall and reinstall and see if that work's. I had most of the vehicles,working my way to get all of them.4 tickets and loved this game but it keeps closing out all of a sudden. And the split second I can play it now I have to start all over from the beginning. Come on man,I put hard work, love and compassion in this game. PLEASE HELP

Almost had me I love it, but I looked at the achievements and saw that you needed to buy certain cars to unlock the achievement. I thought, okay, I can deal with grinding to get in game coins to buy a vehicle. But the only way to purchase those cars is with real money ($25 each) and not in-game currency. A game where you have to literally pay to win is not fun, and leaves no point to playing if the intent is to unlock all the things and accomplish all the achievements if it means spending $50 to buy virtual vehicles.

It looks better.

description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog’s race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs. Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily. Features:Attractive and adventurous game playAmazing multiple races dogsMultiple exciting levels Realistic background sound effectsSmooth and easy controlThrilling and multiple challenges Amazing stunning 3d graphicsRealistic running tracks

description: Raft Survival Simulator - is a sandbox survival simulator game. After ocean accident you've opened your eyes and see blue water and a piece of raft. The last thing that you remember - great shark bites your ship... No one alived in this tragedy except you! Ocean survival is here for you to try yourself!Craft your new home from the rubbish flowing near you. But be carefull. The sharks are near your raft. And they are really hungry! Use your hook to catch resources. Use a hammer to destroy everything, even your last raft!Features of game:- open ocean - you can make your own island to survive;- several types of weapons with different behaviours (hook, hammer);- a lot of craft items and constructions;- everything you need for water survival!Thank you for downloading Raft Survival Simulator! We are appreciate any feedback and your ideas! Please give us motivation to make a great game by rating the game with a good mark! All the resources, that are used in this game - are licensed or under royalty free license!
descriptionHTML:
Raft Survival Simulator - is a sandbox survival simulator game. After ocean accident you've opened your eyes and see blue water and a piece of raft. The last thing that you remember - great shark bites your ship... No one alived in this tragedy except you! Ocean survival is here for you to try yourself!

Craft your new home from the rubbish flowing near you. But be carefull. The sharks are near your raft. And they are really hungry! Use your hook to catch resources. Use a hammer to destroy everything, even your last raft!

Features of game:
- open ocean - you can make your own island to survive;
- several types of weapons with different behaviours (hook, hammer);
- a lot of craft items and constructions;
- everything you need for water survival!

Thank you for downloading Raft Survival Simulator! We are appreciate any feedback and your ideas! Please give us motivation to make a great game by rating the game with a good mark! All the resources, that are used in this game - are licensed or under royalty free license!

description: CLASSIC BUBBLE SHOOTING FUN!Match, pop and burst all the colorful bubbles in this addictive, enjoyable puzzle game. Play now for free and enjoy plenty of challenging puzzles and levels.  The fun never ends with Ultimate Bubbles! Experience the thrill of shooting and blasting bubbles and challenge yourself with thousands of exciting levels as you advance through the game. Join the fun and enjoy popping all the colored balls anytime and anywhere you want.   If you love online puzzle games and just can’t get enough of exciting brain teasers, Ultimate Bubbles is the perfect game for you!  Play & Discover:- Crazy bubble popping fun.   - Thousands of levels to solve, with unique features and challenges. - Awesome boosters and power-ups. - Free to play!- Addictive gameplay, cool visual effects.  Pop all Bubbles to Win!- Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to burst bubbles.  	- Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop. - Boost your experience with awesome power-ups. - Master all the different challenges and solve fun puzzles.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                - Crush the bubbles and clear the board.                                                                                                 - Pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball that will burn every bubble on the way.                         - Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.                   - Take your time and plan your moves. Start the thrilling adventure today and explore plenty of exciting levels packed with awesome power-ups and challenging puzzles. Thanks for playing and enjoy the game!
